posts.post_content:
For sale is a PSA 2 (Good) conditioned T-206 card of Patsy Dougherty (Portrait). Card back is a Piedmont 150. Card does have a crease in top right corner, but very nice centering and does not appear to have any paper loss. Price is $40.00 with shipping by PayPal F/F only to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. See attached scan.

Thanks,

Bill
